name: part_011
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ3D】シャチ出没注意【ホロライブ】 [MOekZ-g5qJQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Sakamata Chloe announces her birthday commemorative merchandise during her 3D debut stream.
3D performance of the song "Deal with the devil".

subtitles.original: ...ということで、3D配信楽しみに待っててください！
subtitles.english: ...so please look forward to the 3D stream!

subtitles.original: はい、沙花叉からのニュースはこちら、ドドン！
subtitles.english: Alright, here's the news from Sakamata, ta-da!

subtitles.original: 沙花叉クロヱの...なんだっけ？誕生日記念グッズ...き、へぇ...噛んじゃった。
subtitles.english: Sakamata Chloe's... what was it? Birthday commemorative goods... ki, eh... I stumbled over my words.

subtitles.original: はい、アクリルジオラマスタンド、販売中です！
subtitles.english: Yes, the acrylic diorama stand is on sale!

subtitles.original: 見て見て、これ真似してみるわ。どう？似てる？どう？
subtitles.english: Look, look, I'll try to mimic it. How is it? Do I look like it? How about it?

subtitles.original: こんな可愛いアクリルジオラマスタンドがついております。
subtitles.english: This cute acrylic diorama stand is included.

subtitles.original: そして、噂になっちゃってるとか、なってないとか、なってないとか聞きますけど...
subtitles.english: And, I hear it's becoming a rumor, or not, or not, but...

subtitles.original: ...噂のブレスレット！
subtitles.english: ...the rumored bracelet!

subtitles.original: そして、チョーカーチャーム、沙花叉のこれとお揃いです！
subtitles.english: And the choker charm, it's the same as Sakamata's!

subtitles.original: そして、記念ボイス！こちら全てがセットになっている全部セットでは...
subtitles.english: And the commemorative voice! In the Full Set which includes all of these...

subtitles.original: ...特典ボイスと、そして直筆メッセージ付きポストカードも付きます！
subtitles.english: ...you also get a bonus voice and a postcard with a handwritten message!

subtitles.original: 特典ボイスでは沙花叉が珍しくちょっとだけデレてたり、デレてなかったり。
subtitles.english: In the bonus voice, Sakamata might be acting a bit sweet for once, or she might not.

subtitles.original: そして直筆メッセージ付きポストカードは、汚ねぇ字に思いを込めました。
subtitles.english: And for the postcard with a handwritten message, I put my feelings into my messy handwriting.

subtitles.original: マジで読めるかどうかわかんないけど、みんなには読めるかな？
subtitles.english: I honestly don't know if you'll be able to read it, but can you guys?

subtitles.original: ぜひ、よろしくお願いします！バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Please check it out! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: バイバイバイバイバイ...
subtitles.english: Bye-bye-bye-bye-bye...

subtitles.original: One, two, one...
subtitles.english: One, two, one...

subtitles.original:
Deal with the devil
作詞・作曲：ryo(supercell)
subtitles.english:
Deal with the devil
Lyrics/Composition: ryo(supercell)

subtitles.original: アップダウンは世の常
subtitles.english: Ups and downs are the way of the world

subtitles.original: クズ引いたって動じない
subtitles.english: Even if I draw a bad hand, I won't flinch

subtitles.original: 肝心なのは Strong Mind
subtitles.english: The important thing is a Strong Mind

subtitles.original: 出し抜いて Survive
subtitles.english: Outsmart them and Survive

subtitles.original: 行きつく先は Heaven or hell
subtitles.english: The final destination is Heaven or hell

subtitles.original: この世界のルール
subtitles.english: The rules of this world

subtitles.original: たった一つ 勝者こそが正義
subtitles.english: There's only one: victory is justice

subtitles.original: 女は度胸
subtitles.english: A woman needs courage

subtitles.original: 震わせるのアイツを
subtitles.english: Make him tremble

subtitles.original: やれること なんだってやる
subtitles.english: I'll do whatever it takes

subtitles.original: あたしは賭け狂いのクイーン
subtitles.english: I'm the queen of gambling

subtitles.original: お見通しよ You doubt me
subtitles.english: I see right through you, You doubt me

subtitles.original: 読み切って レッツ Showdown
subtitles.english: Read it all, let's Showdown

subtitles.original: 震えちゃうほど 難しいって
subtitles.english: So difficult it makes me tremble

subtitles.original: あたしのものにする
subtitles.english: I'll make it mine

subtitles.original: あなたの髪の一本まで全部
subtitles.english: Every single strand of your hair

subtitles.original: あげないわ 誰にも
subtitles.english: I won't give it to anyone

subtitles.english: Look, you're trembling

subtitles.original: 降ろさせはしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't let you fold

subtitles.original: Uhhhn 最高
subtitles.english: Uhhhn, the best

subtitles.original: もっと止まらないわスリル
subtitles.english: The thrill won't stop

subtitles.english: I won't let anyone touch this Money

subtitles.original: あげないわ 誰にも
subtitles.english: I won't give it to anyone

subtitles.original: さあ Com'on 覚悟キメて
subtitles.english: Now, come on, steel yourself

subtitles.original: 震えちゃぶれないハート
subtitles.english: A heart that doesn't waver even when trembling

subtitles.original: 欲しがるようじゃね まだベイビー
subtitles.english: If you're still wanting it, you're still a baby

subtitles.original: 誰にも あげない
subtitles.english: I won't give it to anyone

subtitles.original: 感じさせてあげるわ
subtitles.english: I'll make you feel it

subtitles.original: あなた内緒だわ
subtitles.english: It's a secret with you

subtitles.original: ほら見せてあげる
subtitles.english: Look, I'll show you

subtitles.original: 秘密って甘いの
subtitles.english: Secrets are sweet

subtitles.original: 仕掛けて 罠にはめるわ
subtitles.english: Setting it up and trapping you

subtitles.original: 油断誘うのよ
subtitles.english: I'll tempt your carelessness

subtitles.original: 思考を止めたら ジ・エンド
subtitles.english: If you stop thinking, it's the end

subtitles.original: 何も知らないような表情で
subtitles.english: With a look like you know nothing

subtitles.original: 落とすわあなたを
subtitles.english: I'll bring you down

subtitles.original: お見通しよ You doubt me
subtitles.english: I see right through you, You doubt me

subtitles.original: 読み切って レッツ Showdown
subtitles.english: Read it all, let's Showdown

subtitles.original: 見逃さない どんな小さなズルだって
subtitles.english: I won't miss even the smallest cheat

subtitles.original: あたしの目はごまかされないわ
subtitles.english: My eyes won't be deceived

subtitles.original: あげないわ 誰にも
subtitles.english: I won't give it to anyone

subtitles.original: 勝った相手は骨まで
subtitles.english: My defeated opponent, down to the bone

subtitles.original: 愛し尽くしてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll love you completely

subtitles.original: 狙った獲物は逃がさない
subtitles.english: I won't let the targeted prey escape

subtitles.original: 唇濡らして いただくわ
subtitles.english: Wetting my lips, I'll have you

subtitles.original: Babe
subtitles.english: Babe

subtitles.original: ダイヤのジャックで手が揃う
subtitles.english: Hand's complete with the Jack of Diamonds

subtitles.original: 笑みを殺し 待つだけ
subtitles.english: Kill the smile and just wait

subtitles.original: あたしのポーカーフェイスは It's perfect
subtitles.english: My poker face is, It's perfect

subtitles.original: 一分の隙も見せたりしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't show even a moment's weakness
